tags.name: lit-place-input
tags.description: A component with a title and an action counter

properties.name: apiKey
properties.description: Required: A Maps API key. To obtain an API key, see developers.google.com/maps/documentation/javascript/tutorial#api_key.

properties.name: searchCountryCode
properties.description: bias search results to a country code  (ISO 3166-1 Alpha-2 country code, case insensitive).

properties.name: searchBounds
properties.description:
bias search results to a bounding rectangle.
object properties (all are required):```{east: number, // East longitude in degrees.west: number, // West longitude in degrees.north: number, // North latitude in degrees.south: number, // South latitude in degrees.}```

properties.name: searchType
properties.description:
bias search results by type
permitted values:
address
geocode
establishment
(regions)
(cities)

properties.name: latLng
properties.description: an object - { lat: number, lng: number } - representing the geolocation of the entered / selected place

properties.name: place
properties.description: An object containing the place selected or geocoded

properties.name: value
properties.description: The input control's value.

properties.name: type
properties.description: A string specifying the type of control to render.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Sets floating label value.

properties.name: placeholder
properties.description: Sets disappearing input placeholder.

properties.name: icon
properties.description: Leading icon to display in input.

properties.name: iconTrailing
properties.description: Trailing icon to display in input.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Whether or not the input should be disabled.

properties.name: charCounter
properties.description: **Note: requries maxLength to be set.** Display character counter with max length.

properties.name: outlined
properties.description: Whether or not to show the material outlined variant.

properties.name: fullwidth
properties.description: Whether or not to make the input fullwidth. No longer displays label; only placeholder and helper.

properties.name: helper
properties.description: Helper text to display below the input. Display default only when focused.

properties.name: helperPersistent
properties.description: Always show the helper text despite focus.

properties.name: required
properties.description: Displays error state if value is empty and input is blurred.

properties.name: maxLength
properties.description: Maximum length to accept input.

properties.name: validationMessage
properties.description: Message to show in the error color when the textfield is invalid. (Helper text will not be visible)

properties.name: pattern
properties.description: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Guide/HTML/HTML5/Constraint_validation#Validation-related_attributes

properties.name: min
properties.description: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Guide/HTML/HTML5/Constraint_validation#Validation-related_attributes

properties.name: max
properties.description: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Guide/HTML/HTML5/Constraint_validation#Validation-related_attributes

properties.name: step
properties.description: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/Guide/HTML/HTML5/Constraint_validation#Validation-related_attributes

properties.name: validity
properties.description: The (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/ValidityState of the textfield.

properties.name: validityTransform
properties.description: Callback called before each validation check. See the (#Validation) for more details.

properties.name: validateOnInitialRender
properties.description: Runs validation check on initial render.

cssProperties.name: --mdc-theme-primary
cssProperties.description: Color when active of the underline ripple, the outline, and the caret.

cssProperties.name: --mdc-theme-error
cssProperties.description: Color when errored of the underline, the outline, the caret, and the icons.

cssProperties.name: --mdc-text-field-filled-border-radius
cssProperties.description: Border radius of the standard / filled textfield's background filling.

cssProperties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-idle-border-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's  outline when idle.

cssProperties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-hover-border-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when hovering.

cssProperties.name: --mdc-text-field-outlined-disabled-border-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the outlined textfield's outline when disabled.

cssProperties.name: --mdc-text-field-fill-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the textfield's background fill (non-outlined).

cssProperties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-fill-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the textfield's background fill (non-outlined) when disabled.

cssProperties.name: --mdc-text-field-label-ink-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the non-focused floating label, helper text, char counter, and placeholder.

cssProperties.name: --mdc-text-field-disabled-ink-color
cssProperties.description: Color of the input text, the floating label, helper text, char counter, and placeholder of a disabled
